食品安全提示以防止生病聚会，家庭晚餐和其他提供食物的聚会都是节日欢呼的一部分。但是，如果食物使您或其他人生病，欢乐可能会变成痛苦。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250131/food-safety-tips-to-to-to-to-weep-illness-at-at-bay.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250131/food-safety-tips-top-to-to-weep-illness-atness-at-bay.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d61c5915-35a9-4059-4059-b003-86446f3454bc Fri, 31 Jan 2025 14:22:49 -0500 Food safety tips to keep illness at bay

新发现可以使现成的汽车T细胞疗法成为现实CAR T细胞疗法是近年来出现的最有希望的新癌症治疗方法之一。它涉及去除患者自己的免疫T细胞并进行工程，以识别癌细胞表面的特定靶标。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250131/new-findings-could-make-could-make-the-shelf-car-car-t-cell-therapy-a-reality.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250131/new-findings-could-make-could-make-the-helf-car-car-t-cell-t-cell-therapy-a-reality.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d23d61d9-4788-4788-473f-9A8B-84C7C7CDB82359 Fri, 31 Jan 2025 13:20:00 -0500 New findings could make off-the-shelf CAR T cell therapy a reality

研究人员开发了T细胞生长方法，从而增强了黑色素瘤模型中的癌症能力研究结果表明，改变T细胞中的葡萄糖代谢会增强其针对黑色素瘤的治疗潜力，为改善免疫疗法铺平了道路。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250131/researchers-develop-t-cell-t-cell-growth-method-method-that-enhances-cancercancer-cancer-fighting-cancer-in-sibal-sibal-sibalibalibal-in-melanomamo in-melanomamanomamomamomamomamomamodel.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250131/researchers-develop-t-cell-t-cell-growth-method-method-that-enhances-cancer-cancer-fighting-cancer-in-sibal-sibalibal-in-in-melanomamanome-in-melanomamanome-melanomamanome-model.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=602c3f04-5dfd-4731-A875-426B6B6ED63C6E Fri, 31 Jan 2025 13:05:00 -0500 Researchers develop T cell growth method that enhances cancer-fighting ability in melanoma model
杜克工程师开发了AI平台，以靶向不良疾病蛋白杜克大学的生物医学工程师开发了一个基于AI的平台，该平台设计了短蛋白，称为肽，能够结合和破坏以前不受困难的引起疾病的蛋白质。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250131/duke-engineers-develop--ai-platform-to-target-target-undroggable-disease-proteins.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250131/duke-engineers-develop--ai-platform-to-target-target-target-undroggable-disease-disease-proteins.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4c822830-32f0-43b4-43b4-8eab-7753f3cac182 Fri, 31 Jan 2025 10:03:29 -0500 Duke engineers develop AI platform to target undruggable disease proteins
